title: India's Controversial Crypto Tax Should Be Cut After Failing to Achieve Aims, Think Tank Urges
description: India's most controversial crypto tax, the 1% TDS levy deducted at source, should be lowered to 0.01%, according to the findings of a new study.

title: U.S. Crypto Stocks Ride BTC Momentum in Pre-Market Trading
description: COIN, MSTR, HOOD and mining stocks were all showing upward movement in pre-market trading after BTC rose to its highest level in 18 months.

title: Yuga Labs Says 'UV-A Emitting Lights' to Blame for ApeFest Attendees' Eye Pain
description: Owners of the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT collection complained of eye pain following the three-day ApeFest event in Hong Kong.

title: Binance’s open interest up by 10% as Bitcoin trading fervor hits 3-month high
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin futures open interest has witnessed a considerable surge, marking a positive shift in the cryptocurrency market. title: Bitcoin (BTC) Reaches $36K Amid ETF Price Impact Anticipation
description: Bitcoin (BTC) briefly hit $36,000, reflecting a significant upsurge in value. The potential approval of a Bitcoin ETF by BlackRock is driving positive market sentiment and expectations. title: Polygon Labs and NEAR Foundation Collaborate to Build zkWasm Prover
description:
Polygon Labs and Near Foundation have recently announced their partnership to build a zero-knowledge prover for WASM (zkWASM) blockchains during the NEARCON in Lisbon. This integration will enable any WebAssembly chain to prove itself in the Ethereum ecosystem while benefiting from the security features of Layer 2. In a recent post on X (formerly known […]

The post Polygon Labs and NEAR Foundation Collaborate to Build zkWasm Prover appeared first on Coin Edition.
